short_summary: Live Staking Restoration at the Northwest Marsh Unit of Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area
description: This is a multi-year project that focuses on increasing the riparian ecotones and providing restoration site maintenance to support migratory birds, species at risk, and conservation outcomes within the NWA. The project will run from contract award to March 31, 2026.
full_summary:
=================
### Live Staking Restoration at the Northwest Marsh Unit of Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area

**Call for Proposal Number: 5000072674**

**Period of Performance: June 19, 2023 – March 31, 2026**

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor to provide Live Staking Restoration services at the Northwest Marsh Unit of Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area. The contract duration spans 3 years, encompassing the fiscal years 2023-2026.

**Purpose and Scope:**
The proposed contractor will be responsible for increasing the riparian ecotones and providing restoration site maintenance, including watering and invasive species management, to support migratory birds, species at risk, and conservation outcomes within the National Wildlife Area (NWA).

**Key Contract Requirements:**

*   Live staking restoration services for the Northwest Marsh Unit of Vaseux-Bighorn National Wildlife Area
*   Site maintenance, including watering and invasive species management
*   Support for migratory birds, species at risk, and conservation outcomes

**Contractor Eligibility:**

*   Contractors must possess relevant experience and expertise in live staking restoration and site maintenance
*   Contractors must have a valid business license and proof of liability insurance

**Proposal Submission:**

*   Proposals must be submitted electronically through Bid Canada no later than 5:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) June 7, 2023
*   Quotations must include a complete and detailed proposal, including all relevant attachments and supporting documentation

**Evaluation Criteria:**

*   Technical Merit
*   Price

**Contract Award:**

*   The contract award will be based on the highest combined rating for Technical Merit and Price

**Contact Information:**

*   For further information, please contact Angelina Garcia at Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca or (778) 726-1680.
